review: Works great needs a volume control on the remote. This is a great little device for the less savy or someone who wants to have a secondary remote. The interface is nice and smooth. The stick requires the use of an outlet to plug the USB cable into if you use the USB port on the TV it says that there isn't enough power. Has some great apps and it is awesome that you can use the any apps you have on the amazon app store.
